review: I have previously met Dr Archik at his clinic so no wonder for me that he was very friendly and helpful today.He gave me quick resolution with medicines

The clinic made us wait for 45 min despite booking an appointment and reaching well before time. Found that to be unprofessional. But the doctor is excellent. First we were made to meet the assistant doctor ,thereby followed by Dr Archik who patiently heard us out and advised us the line of treatment. I have previously visited the doctor for my father ,and now for my husband and I would highly recommend him. He ,unlike many others, does not advise surgery unless absolutely required. Follow up due after a month. Will post an update then. 
For quality treatment do visit him!
reply_text: Our waiting time occassionally goes up due to an unforseen emergency or an elederly patient who takes time to shift from one place to another. We try our best to reduce our waiting time but these things happen unfortunately. We as a clinic would only apologise for the inconvinience caused to you. We really appreciate your feedback as it helps us to improve.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** **** **** **** Went to so many dr most of them told me to do surgery n stop playing. Being a sports man was so upset not a single dr was able to treat me,i was in pain Had no  relief. Thn i met dr archik he listend to all my problem just he reffered me xray and told me no need for  mri. With tht report he started my treatment for just 2 months n he just told me u can do wht ever u want just take precaution while playing n i was so happy tht i was back on the ground after 6 months. Hi treatment is lyk i have no words to express n how happy i am.   now i can walk i can run i can play my sports. Thank u dr thank u so much my lyf is back on track.

I have always refrained from giving a negative review about any Doctor. 
However the experience I had at Doctor Archik's Clinic compelled me to give my first negative review.
To begin with the Doctor's Assistant does a check up before Dr. Archik actually evaluates you. The Assistant Doctor seems to be ************* *** rude. *** ********* **** * ********** ********* ** **** ****** **** *** **** ** ** ********** **** *** *** *** ****** *** ********** ** *** ******** ** *** ********** ***** **** ** **** * ******* **** ***** *** ********* ******* ** ** *** ****** ** *** ***********I had visited him with great hopes given he is such a big name. *** ***** ** *** ***** *** **** *** ** *** *** ********* *** *** ********* **** ******** ** *** ********** ********* ********* *** ***** ** ***** *** *** ******* *** ************* 
I was told anxiety to be the reason. *** ** ***** ******* ***** * ********* ******* ***** *** ********* ** ***** *** **** **** *** ******** *** ** ***** ******* ***** *** **** *** *** ***** ** ******  
The three step process Doctor followed was 1. Diagnostic reports (normal in my case) 2. Mechanical Symptoms (normal) 3. Psychological issue. Nothing else between one to three. 
My problem however reduced by deep tissue messages and the reason attributed was poor circulation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,

review:
A relatively big set up But Dr. Shreedher is brilliant.He has nicely served all his patients. His approach, explanation regarding health problem is tremendous and solutions are really class apart.
This is right place for all those who are searching a doctor who listen them patiently and provide a excellent treatment.He is a high quality orthopedist.The quality is very good in the clinic in all the terms  . Staff behaviour is very good.There was no as such waiting time in the clinic .

 It was my very short visit in the clinic still i am impressed with the arrangements there. Dr has not asked for any extra investigation.I would like to recommend the doctor to my friends and relatives .  A definite yes for him for future consultation.  Overall i am happy with my experience of treatment with Dr Shreedhar. excellent it worth doing treatment with Dr Shreedhar. I spoke to some patients in the clinic i got a positive talks about the doctor.It hs given me the feel of in safe hands.

Taking treatment from Dr. Shreedhar Archik. As he has has mentioned treatment will take few months so I am following up with the dr and Still under medication.
 As per my experience Dr is good in nature patiently listing to all and very friendly in nature. Clinic staff are also good in nature. Dr has not  asked me for any extra investigation and report . I found the treatment worth With Dr Shreedhare .
When I have visited 1st time in the clinic there was approximately 20 minutes of waiting time was thereafter that i have started taking appointment before visiting now there is no as such waiting time. Dr was explaining all the required things clearly during the consultation. Overall experienced is satisfactory and would like to recommend to doctor to my friends and relatives.There is no extra charges  for registration and all in the clinic .
 I will give 10/10 To Dr Shreedhar Archik for their tremendous job.

Dr. Shreedhar Archik Sir is a very true professional. I had visited him for my left leg ankle twist on 19.01.2018, he diagnosed it well & I got immediate relief from his prescribed minimum medications (no unnecessary medicines) and ankle brace to support my leg. He is fully cooperative, good listener, makes patient feel comfortable with his diagnosis. I would highly recommend him...
reply_text: thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The moment you spoke to him ur problem will be gone.  I consulted 5 to 6 docs all suggested for surgery again but Dr.Archik suggested to me for physiotherapy for 1 month and gave me exercises and within 24 days i was able to walk without crutches. I remember his words that surgery should be avoided if possible it should be only last option. **** *********** ****** *** better friend for making me belive that I can walk again without crutches.
reply_text: Happy to note that you recovered fully.

review: ** ** * ******* ** * ****** *** ** *** ***** ** ******** **** He recommended an arthoscopy for my mother for her knee pain and said that her pain would be relieved in a week. It has been 6 months *** *** **** *** **** ********** He didn't even give us the video of the surgery when asked. He also charged us for medical instruments for the surgery, which should have been provided by the hospital. Strongly recommend to not spend time and money on him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: The important thing for any medication to work is that you should be able to trust the doctor. Dr. Shreedhar is an excellent doctor and has a very calming effect on anxious patients. He explained in detail the reasons of ailment and the course correction. His clinic offered all the services like X-ray, Physiotherapy, etc so you donâ€™t have to go to different places.

The doctor patiently listened to my problems and then suggested necessary precautions. He did not prescribe any unnecessary medicines. The physiotherapy was also done very dilligently. I wud definitely recommend patients having spine related issues to Dr. Archik.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had taken my mother for consultation on knee replacement surgery. But We had very bad experience of Dr Archik. Though he is a renowned Doctor in orthopedic field he is not patient friendly. My mother is  more than 60 years old. She couldnt give answers to the specific questions asked by the doctor. Due to this Dr Archik declared that my mother needs Psychiatric treatment before undergoing knee replacement surgery. This is not the way a doctor makes a patient comfortable. This incident has made my mothers approach towards surgery negative. We will think twice before recommending this Doctors name to any one.

Thank you dr. For treatment on PCL knee injury.  Provided me exact exercise for coming out of PCL injury which is very scary. 
Earlier doctor scared me with surgery n blah bur dr archik told me that you will b fine in 45 days and yes exactly same happening.  I am recovering well.
Thanks you doctor
